library.name: Graphics
library.description: Drawing and image-loading functions designed to be used with the Game library.

class.name: GraphicsTexture
class.description: Represents an ImageResource loaded into the graphics engine that can be drawn on the screen.

field.name: width
field.description: Width of the image, in pixels.

field.name: height
field.description: Height of the image, in pixels.

function.name: draw
function.arg: X coordinate
Y coordinate
function.description: Draws an image on the GameWindow screen. The top left corner of the image will be position on the given X and Y coordinates.

function.name: drawWithAlpha
function.arg: X coordinate
Y coordinate
Alpha value (0-255)
function.description: Draws an image on the GameWindow screen. The top left corner of the image will be position on the given X and Y coordinates. The image will have the given opacity.

function.name: drawRegion
function.arg: X coordinate on the screen
Y coordinate on the screen
Left X coordinate of the region within the source texture to draw.
Top Y coordinate of the region within the source texture to draw.
Width of the region within the texture to draw.
Height of the region within the texture to draw.
function.description: Draws a specific region of an image onto the GameWindow screen. The top left corner of the image will be position on the given target X and Y coordinates. Only the region of the texture defined by the source X and Y coordinates and width and height will be drawn to the screen.

function.name: drawStretched
function.arg: X coordinate on the screen
Y coordinate on the screen
Width to stretch the image to.
Height to stretch the image to.
function.description: Draws a stretched (or shrunken) version of an image onto the GameWindow screen. The top left corner of the image will be position on the given target X and Y coordinates. The resulting width and height of the image on the screen is denoted by the width and height values.

function.name: drawRegionStretched
function.arg: X coordinate on the screen
Y coordinate on the screen
Desired width of the image to appear on the screen.
Desired height of the image to appear on the screen.
Left X coordinate of the region within the source texture to draw.
Top Y coordinate of the region within the source texture to draw.
Width of the region within the texture to draw.
Height of the region within the texture to draw.
function.description: A combination of drawRegion and drawStretched. Draws a portion of an image onto the screen and stretches/shrinks it to the given size. The top left corner of the image will be position on the given target X and Y coordinates. The resulting width and height of the image on the screen is denoted by the width and height values.

class.name: Draw
class.description: Collection of functions for drawing 2D geometric primitives onto the game screen.

function.name: ellipse
function.arg: X coordinate of the left side of the ellipse.
Y coordinate of the top side of the ellipse.
Width of the ellipse.
Height of the ellipse.
Red value of the ellipse fill (0-255).
Green value of the ellipse fill (0-255).
Blue value of the ellipse fill (0-255).
Alpha value of the ellipse fill (0-255).
function.description: Draws a filled ellipse on the GameWindow screen.

function.name: line
function.description: Draws a line between the given points with a given width and color.
function.arg: X coordinate of the first point.
Y coordinate of the first point.
X coordinate of the second point.
Y coordinate of the second point.
Width of the line.
Red value of the line color (0-255).
Green value of the line color (0-255).
Blue value of the line color (0-255).
Alpha value of the line color (0-255).

function.name: rectangle
function.description: Draws an axis-aligned filled rectangle at the given coordinates and color.
function.arg: X coordinate of the left side of the rectangle.
Y coordinate of the top side of the rectangle.
Width of the rectangle.
Height of the rectangle.
Red value of the line color (0-255).
Green value of the line color (0-255).
Blue value of the line color (0-255).
Alpha value of the line color (0-255).

function.name: triangle
function.description: Draws an arbitrary triangle with the given fill color.
function.arg: X coordinate of the first point.
Y coordinate of the first point.
X coordinate of the second point.
Y coordinate of the second point.
X coordinate of the third point.
Y coordinate of the third point.
Red value of the line color (0-255).
Green value of the line color (0-255).
Blue value of the line color (0-255).
Alpha value of the line color (0-255).

function.name: quad
function.description: Draws a quadrilateral on the screen.
function.arg: X coordinate of the first point.
Y coordinate of the first point.
X coordinate of the second point.
Y coordinate of the second point.
X coordinate of the third point.
Y coordinate of the third point.
X coordinate of the fourth point.
Y coordinate of the fourth point.
Red value of the line color (0-255).
Green value of the line color (0-255).
Blue value of the line color (0-255).
Alpha value of the line color (0-255).

function.name: fill
function.description: Fills the screen with an opaque color.
function.arg: Red value of the fill (0-255).
Green value of the fill (0-255).
Blue value of the fill (0-255).
